item.title: Behavior modelling with AI
item.description: I used AI computational models to study human gameplay as part of the Matemarote project. It involved reinforcement learning, and technical skills such as SQL and javascript.

item.title: PhD4PMI
item.description: A machine learning tool to analyze and visualize geolocation data. It was part of the PHD4PMI initiative. Me and Natalia Grion, worked on this project for Innova SPA.

item.title: Physics Department Joomla research component
item.description: I developed a joomla component for the front and backend of the research section of the physics department of the University of Buenos Aires’ webpage. It used a combination of php, jQuery, bootstrap, and MySQL.

item.title: PyMC3
item.description: As part of pymc-devs, I work on the development and maintenance of PyMC3, a python package for probabilistic programming and MCMC.

item.title: PyMC4
item.description: As part of pymc-devs, I work on the development of PyMC4, a python package for probabilistic programming that works with Tensorflow probability.

item.title: Sensory processing in rats
item.description: Neural population model of rat primary somatosensory cortex and how it drives the fealing of the passage of time. This is an ongoing project at the Tactile perception and learning lab at SISSA, Trieste.
